message.body: Hey anthony i just got your email about the music vids. Im dan. How are u
wassup dan im fine im ready to get to work asap do you do anything else besides videos???
Do you have an recording studio or do you do graphics for mixtape covers and do you do photo shoots anything that has to do with music
No recording studio. But yeah i can do graphic design and photo shoots. What kind of music do you make?
Rap and a Lil bit of r&b
When will yu be free to get started??
i am free weekends and weeknights after 6...u got a song in mind? How much are u lookin to spend?
Yea I got about 4 songs in mind so we ca work out a group rate for the whole for or we ca just set a price for one
Yeah i think we should do one first and then if it works out we can go head with other 3. That sound alright?
Yea thats cool how much tho??
i think it's easier if u tell me how much your lookin to spend. Then i can work around your budget. Im lookin for 250 tho
